metadata.name: Suspicious Execution From Outlook Temporary Folder
metadata.comment: Detects a suspicious program execution in Outlook temp folder

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\temporary internet files\\content.outlook\\')))

output.summary: Detects a suspicious program execution in Outlook temp folder

metadata.objective: False positive: Unknown Reference: Internal Research
